posts.title: The Simpsons Flaming Moe Energy Drink
posts.content: Now you can chug down one of Springfield’s trendiest nightclub drinks with the Flaming Moe energy drink. It features a delightful cotton-candy-like taste and features Moe Szyslak holding up his signature drink right on the can.

posts.title: Pie Face Roulette Game
posts.content: Test your luck as you try to avoid getting your face spattered while playing this Pie Face roulette game. After spinning, each player places their head on the chin rest and begins turning the handle until someone gets a face full of pie.

posts.title: Multi-Person Towable Oval Tube
posts.content: Break your personal speed record while being towed on the multi-person oval tube. The unconventional shape of the tube allows you to cruise through the water with less aerodynamic drag for the fastest and wildest ride you’ve ever experienced.

posts.title: LED Bike Lights
posts.content: Keep from becoming roadkill on your next nighttime ride with the LED bike lights. These all weather lights fit discretely on the bottom of the bike frame and emit a luminous glow that oncoming cars will be able to see from a distance.

posts.title: Tramp Stamp Bleacher Seat
posts.content: Treat every sports fan sitting behind you to a sight for sore eyes when you’re sitting on the tramp stamp bleacher seat. This comical foam seat will turn those cold and rigid steel bleachers into a comfortable seat that screams out that your ass is classy.

posts.title: Cereal Killer Bowl
posts.content: Turn the breakfast table into a delicious crime scene by eating out of this cereal killer bowl. It’s hand crafted from kiln fired ceramic and decorated with bright red markings all over the inside and outside of the bowl designed to look like blood spatter.

posts.title: Raptor Dog Costume
posts.content: Your dog is already a terrifying beast, so give him the best outlet for his reign of terror with the raptor dog costume. This costume turns your lap dog into a tiny version of T-Rex, the king of all dinosaurs. It will match his tiny, vicious howl.

posts.title: App Enabled BB-8 Force Band Control
posts.content: Impress everyone with your Jedi tricks by using the force band control to maneuver your little app-enabled BB-8 droid. This control band fits on your wrist just like a watch and allows you to move your little droid with a wave of your hand.

posts.title: Grow The F*ck Up Book
posts.content: “Grow The Fuck Up” is the hilarious yet highly informative book that teaches you all the things a grown-ass person like yourself should know by now. You’ll learn everything from how to change car tires, to applying for college loans and writing a resume.

posts.title: Gold Playing Cards
posts.content: Give poker nights a regal touch by breaking out these one of a kind gold playing cards. Featuring Ben Franklin’s lucrative mug, the deck comes coated with 999.9 foil gold plating and features a beautiful mahogany case to keep them in mint condition.

posts.title: Alternate Histories Of The World
posts.content: Become a cultured citizen by brushing up on your history with this “Alternate Histories of the World” book. An incredible collection of images and maps give insight into the world as defined by our struggles and alliances with monsters and supernatural creatures.

posts.title: Four Channel Digital Mixer
posts.content: Take your DJing skills to the next level by unleashing your creativity on the four channel digital mixer. This ground-breaking mixer comes equipped with a Xone dual filter system and is powered by a quad FX core DSP engine.
